edu.biu.scapi.midLayer.symmetricCrypto.mac

Interface CbcMac

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Mac, MacSignSecLevel, OneTime, PrfVaryingInputLength, PseudorandomFunction, SecurityLevel, UniqueTagMac, UnlimitedTimes
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ScCbcMacPrepending

    public interface CbcMac
extends UniqueTagMac, PrfVaryingInputLength, UnlimitedTimes
    General interface for CBC-Mac. every class that implement the cbc-mac algorithm should implement this interface.
    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Moriya Farbstein)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void startMac(int msgLength)
      Pre-pends the length if the message to the message.

      • Methods inherited from interface edu.biu.scapi.midLayer.symmetricCrypto.mac.Mac

        doFinal, generateKey, generateKey, getAlgorithmName, getMacSize, isKeySet, mac, setKey, update, verify

      • Methods inherited from interface edu.biu.scapi.primitives.prf.PseudorandomFunction

        computeBlock, computeBlock, computeBlock, generateKey, generateKey, getAlgorithmName, getBlockSize, isKeySet, setKey

    • Method Detail

      • startMac

        void startMac(int msgLength)
        Pre-pends the length if the message to the message. As a result, the mac will be calculated on [msgLength||msg].
        Parameters:
        msgLength - the length of the message in bytes.
